languages.text: "Пока Футфол был под моей опекой, я милостиво охранял торговые маршруты, ведущие к нему. Но теперь их безопасность — не моя забота. В соответствии со своими привилегиями, я нарекаю систему Фурибундус и прилегающие к ней зоной вольной охоты. Всякий груз, взятый в ней моим подданным, будет считаться честным трофеем, а не пиратской добычей".

traits.locale_text: "Пока Футфол был под моей опекой, я милостиво охранял торговые маршруты, ведущие к нему. Но теперь их безопасность — не моя забота. В соответствии со своими привилегиями, я нарекаю систему Фурибундус и прилегающие к ней зоной вольной охоты. Всякий груз, взятый в ней моим подданным, будет считаться честным трофеем, а не пиратской добычей".

languages.text: "While Footfall was in my charge, I graciously guarded its trade routes. But now their safety is no longer my concern. In accordance with my privileges, I hereby declare Furibundus and the neighbouring systems to be a free hunting zone. Any item of cargo procured in it by a subject of mine will be considered a fair trophy rather than the proceeds of piracy."
languages.original_text: "Пока Футфол был под моей опекой, я милостиво охранял торговые маршруты, ведущие к нему. Но теперь их безопасность — не моя забота. В соответствии со своими привилегиями, я нарекаю систему Фурибундус и прилегающие к ней зоной вольной охоты. Всякий груз, взятый в ней моим подданным, будет считаться честным трофеем, а не пиратской добычей".

traits.locale_text: "While Footfall was in my charge, I graciously guarded its trade routes. But now their safety is no longer my concern. In accordance with my privileges, I hereby declare Furibundus and the neighboring systems to be a free hunting zone. Any item of cargo procured in it by a subject of mine will be considered a fair trophy rather than pirate loot."

In accordance with my privileges, I hereby declare Furibundus and the neighboring systems to be a free hunting zone. Any item of cargo procured in it by a subject of mine will be considered a fair trophy rather than pirate loot."

Any item of cargo procured in it by a subject of mine will be considered a fair trophy rather than the proceeds of piracy."

"While Footfall was in my charge, I graciously guarded its trade routes. But now their safety is no longer my concern. In accordance with my privileges, I hereby declare Furibundus and the neighbouring systems to be a free hunting zone. Any item of cargo procured in it by a subject of mine will be considered a fair trophy rather than the proceeds of piracy."

languages.text: 「俺はフットフォールの責任者だが、寛大にもその交易路を保護していたんだ。だが、今やその安全は俺には関係ない。俺の特権を用いて、フュリバンダスとその隣接する星系を自由狩猟区域とすることをここに宣言する。俺の臣下がその区域で入手した積み荷は何であれ、海賊行為の略奪品ではなく正当な戦利品として扱うものとする」
languages.original_text: "While Footfall was in my charge, I graciously guarded its trade routes. But now their safety is no longer my concern. In accordance with my privileges, I hereby declare Furibundus and the neighbouring systems to be a free hunting zone. Any item of cargo procured in it by a subject of mine will be considered a fair trophy rather than the proceeds of piracy."

traits.locale_text: 「俺はフットフォールの責任者だが、寛大にもその交易路を保護していたんだ。だが、今やその安全は俺には関係ない。俺の特権を用いて、フュリバンダスとその隣接する星系を自由狩猟区域とすることをここに宣言する。俺の臣下がその区域で入手した積み荷は何であれ、海賊行為の略奪品ではなく正当な戦利品として扱うものとする」

languages.text: “落脚港归我管的时候，是我为它的贸易路线提供了慷慨的保护。如今，既然我已经不必再保护它的周边安全，那么根据我拥有的特权，我在此宣布：怒焰星系及其周边星系都会成为自由狩猎区。只要是我的臣民，无论在这片区域得到了什么东西，那些东西都应该被视为合法的战利品，而非海盗的赃物。”
languages.original_text: "While Footfall was in my charge, I graciously guarded its trade routes. But now their safety is no longer my concern. In accordance with my privileges, I hereby declare Furibundus and the neighbouring systems to be a free hunting zone. Any item of cargo procured in it by a subject of mine will be considered a fair trophy rather than the proceeds of piracy."

traits.locale_text: “落脚港归我管的时候，是我为它的贸易路线提供了慷慨的保护。如今，既然我已经不必再保护它的周边安全，那么根据我拥有的特权，我在此宣布：怒焰星及其周边星系都会成为自由狩猎区。只要是我的臣民，无论在这片区域得到了什么东西，那些东西都应该被视为合法的战利品，而非海盗的赃物。”

languages.text: «Mientras Paso estaba a mi cargo, protegí magnánimamente sus rutas comerciales. Pero ahora su seguridad no me concierne. Conforme a mis privilegios, declaro Furibundus y los sectores colindantes una zona de caza libre. Cualquier cargamento obtenido por mis súbditos en esta zona se considerará un trofeo legítimo y no un fruto de la piratería».
languages.original_text: "While Footfall was in my charge, I graciously guarded its trade routes. But now their safety is no longer my concern. In accordance with my privileges, I hereby declare Furibundus and the neighbouring systems to be a free hunting zone. Any item of cargo procured in it by a subject of mine will be considered a fair trophy rather than the proceeds of piracy."

traits.locale_text: «Mientras Paso estaba a mi cargo, protegí magnánimamente sus rutas comerciales. Pero ahora su seguridad no me concierne. Conforme a mis privilegios, declaro Furibundus y los sectores colindantes una zona de caza libre. Cualquier cargamento obtenido por mis súbditos en esta zona se considerará un trofeo legítimo y no un fruto de la piratería».

languages.text: « Tant que Castel se trouvait sous ma responsabilité, ses routes commerciales étaient également sous ma protection, mais maintenant que cela ne me concerne plus... En accord avec mes privilèges, je déclare Furibundus et les systèmes environnants zone de chasse libre. Toute cargaison dont s'emparerait l'un de mes sujets sera donc considérée comme un trophée justement gagné, et non comme le produit d'un acte de piraterie. »
languages.original_text: "While Footfall was in my charge, I graciously guarded its trade routes. But now their safety is no longer my concern. In accordance with my privileges, I hereby declare Furibundus and the neighbouring systems to be a free hunting zone. Any item of cargo procured in it by a subject of mine will be considered a fair trophy rather than the proceeds of piracy."

traits.locale_text: « Tant que Castel se trouvait sous ma responsabilité, ses routes commerciales étaient également sous ma protection, mais maintenant que cela ne me concerne plus... En accord avec mes privilèges, je déclare Furibundus et les systèmes environnants zone de chasse libre. Toute cargaison dont s'emparerait l'un de mes sujets sera donc considérée comme un trophée justement gagné, et non comme le produit d'un acte de piraterie. »

languages.text: "Solange ich für Footfall zuständig war, beschützte ich großzügig seine Handelsrouten. Doch nun ist ihre Sicherheit nicht länger meine Sorge. In Einklang mit meinen Privilegien erkläre ich hiermit Furibundus und seine Nachbarsysteme zur freien Jagdzone. Jedes dort von einem meiner Untertanen in Besitz gebrachte Frachtstück gilt als legale Trophäe, nicht mehr als Piratenbeute."
languages.original_text: "While Footfall was in my charge, I graciously guarded its trade routes. But now their safety is no longer my concern. In accordance with my privileges, I hereby declare Furibundus and the neighbouring systems to be a free hunting zone. Any item of cargo procured in it by a subject of mine will be considered a fair trophy rather than the proceeds of piracy."

traits.locale_text: "Solange ich für Footfall zuständig war, beschützte ich großzügig seine Handelsrouten. Doch nun ist ihre Sicherheit nicht länger meine Sorge. In Einklang mit meinen Privilegien erkläre ich hiermit Furibundus und seine Nachbarsysteme zur freien Jagdzone. Jedes dort von einem meiner Untertanen in Besitz gebrachte Frachtstück gilt als legale Trophäe, nicht mehr als Piratenbeute."

languages.text: "Binliman benim sorumluluğumdayken ticaret yollarını itinayla koruyordum. Artık güvenlikleri beni ilgilendirmiyor. Ayrıcalıklarım dâhilinde Furibundus ve komşu sistemlerin serbest av bölgesi olduğunu ilan ediyorum. Tebaamın buralardan elde ettiği kalemler, korsanlık kazancından ziyade haklı bir ganimet sayılacaktır."
languages.original_text: "While Footfall was in my charge, I graciously guarded its trade routes. But now their safety is no longer my concern. In accordance with my privileges, I hereby declare Furibundus and the neighbouring systems to be a free hunting zone. Any item of cargo procured in it by a subject of mine will be considered a fair trophy rather than the proceeds of piracy."

traits.locale_text: "Binliman benim sorumluluğumdayken ticaret yollarını itinayla koruyordum ama artık güvenlikleri beni ilgilendirmiyor. Ayrıcalıklarım dâhilinde Furibundus ve komşu sistemlerin serbest av bölgesi olduğunu beyan ediyorum. Tebaamdan birinin buralardan elde ettiği herhangi bir kalem, korsanlık girişiminden ziyade haklı bir ganimet sayılacaktır."
